author: lgo
msg: ra_serf: Fix the requested depth when fetching directory info. To get the
properties we need depth 0, to get the directory entries we need depth 1.
This reverts r31478 which tried to fix the original issue introduced in
r31375 but in fact made matters worse.
(svn_ra_serf__get_dir): Use the right depth at the right place.

author: lgo
msg: ra_serf: When querying the base properties from the repository, read and cache
(svn_ra_serf__get_uuid): Fetch the base props from the repository to find the
uuid. Once cached in the session, return the uuid directly from the cache.
(svn_ra_serf__discover_root): Cache the repository uuid in the session.

author: lgo
msg: Add a very clear comment about what the file target-tests.c, which may
look like a C test, really is.
